header.rec_loc: Kitchen in a shared House in Finchley London; all speakersâ€™ home.
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Vegetarianism, synthetic/cultured meat/shmeat, vitamin tablets, animal cruelty, oppression, the environment, the cooking, hunting vs abattoirs, Curb Your Enthusiasm.
header.activity: Best friends and Housemates talking while cooking dinner no.2.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, advising, anecdote telling

speaker.dialect_rep: Non- regional - slight influence of American mother, lived in Cambridgeshire most of my life
